### Spawning and Rearing Modeling Details 

The spawning and rearing data used for Bear Creek is the regional approximation for the Upper-mid Sacramento River Region. More information about this methodology can be found [here](http://cvpia-habitat-docs-markdown.s3-website-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/watershed/Regional_Approximation.html).


## Floodplain Plot
```{r}
bear_creek_floodplain %>% 
  select(FR_floodplain_acres, watershed, flow_cfs) %>%
  rename(`Fall Run Chinook and Steelhead` = FR_floodplain_acres) %>% 
  gather(Species, acres, -flow_cfs, -watershed) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(flow_cfs, acres, color = Species)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = 'Dark2') +
  labs(x = 'Flow (cfs)', y = 'Total Inundated Acres')
```
